# Thrombotic Thrombocytopenic Purpura

Potentially life-threatening MAHA due to small vessel platelet microthrombi, caused by severe deficiency in the ADAMTS13 protein.

## Clinical Features

Pentad of:

* Thrombocytopaenia
* MAHA
* Fever
* Renal dysfunction
* Neurological abnormalities


Other features include:

* Hepatic dysfunction
* Pulmonary dysfunction
